segments.text: What a careless mess in this kitchen; it's infuriating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, drying dishes while the sink overflows wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere, ruining the cabinets and soaking the floor—how can she not see?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are climbing on an unstable stool to steal cookies; that's unacceptable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could fall and hurt himself, all for a silly snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl encouraging him makes it worse; they're both in on this mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be supervising them, not ignoring the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and someone will slip—it's so preventable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the peaceful garden view can't calm me; this negligence is outrageous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is the faucet still running? Turn it off already!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling to snap her out of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids breaking rules right under her nose is just frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR
